references.paper_title: Apprenticeship learning via inverse reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of inverse reinforcement learning, a crucial concept for AI value alignment, and directly inspired the present work.
This paper introduces quantile fairness, which provided a key theoretical foundation for the volumetric interpretation of fairness notions in the present work.

references.paper_title: Fair federated learning via the proportional veto core
references.reason: This paper introduces the volumetric interpretation of the proportional veto core and established the algorithm used for computing stochastic policies in the current work.
This seminal paper in social choice theory is foundational to the understanding of strategyproofness and aggregation of preferences and is central to the discussion of fairness in the current paper.
This paper introduced the proportional veto core which is discussed in this paper as an important concept in the policy aggregation problem.
